channel.title: The Dominator - Neutral Killer
channel.description:
> [Color=white]***The Dominator - Neutral Killer**(Unique)*[/Color] > > *(Passives)* > > **Protect me!** - When attacked,The player who got [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] will die for [Color=white]***Dominator***[/Color] instead.(If the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player has death immune,it still works like usual and got death immune result.) > *(Day ability)* > > ***Allure(2 Charges)*** - Make the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player vote for target player.(Will also follow your vote at trial) > > ***Force Sucide(2 Charges)*** - Abandon the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player and attack him.Can also maked the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player's class appear as what [Color=white]***Dominator***[/Color] chooses(Bypass death immunity,Occupy,Imprison,Redirect)(Can also do Mind Control after so)(Cannot be healed) > > *(Night ability)* > > ***Mind Control(Infinite Charges)*** - [Color=orange]***Control***[/Color] a player,Will trigger Knight protect ability. > > ***Lost Souls(Infinite Charges)*** - Make the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player Attack 1 Target. > > ***Goal***:Kill all of the BD and Unseen/Cult
[Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player can't talk,vote and access log or death log.(Can still use day/night ability)When [Color=white]***Dominator***[/Color] died,this perk will get disabled.Also,[Color=white]***Dominator***[/Color] can talk as that player at day.But can't vote as him.(Need to use Allure.).Can also hear whisper to the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color]Player.When the [Color=orange]***Controlled***[/Color] player is imprisoned,[Color=white]***Dominator***[/Color] Can't use his ability that night(Can also have ONLY 1 Controlled player.)
Edit 1.1 - Buffed Force Sucide.

item.title: The Dominator - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Just have them also be able to play as the class (probably with some restrictions like not getting a second kill through Assassin) and have the controlled player “die”, so they can move on in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: The Dominator - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: Lastday3312
item.description:
The Dominator - Neutral Killer(Unique)

(Passives)

Protect me! - When attacked,The player who got Controlled will die for Dominator instead.(If the Controlled player has death immune,it still works like usual and got death immune result.)
(Day ability)

Allure(2 Charges) - Make the Controlled player vote for target player.(Will also follow your vote at trial)

Force Sucide(2 Charges) - Abandon the Controlled player and attack him.Can also maked the Controlled player’s class appear as what Dominator chooses(Bypass death immunity,Occupy,Imprison,Redirect)(Can also do Mind Control after so)(Cannot be healed)

(Night ability)

Mind Control(Infinite Charges) - Control a player,Will trigger Knight protect ability.

Lost Souls(Infinite Charges) - Make the Controlled player Attack 1 Target.

Goal:Kill all of the BD and Unseen/Cult

Controlled player can’t talk,vote and access log or death log.(Can still use day/night ability)When Dominator died,this perk will get disabled.Also,Dominator can talk as that player at day.But can’t vote as him.(Need to use Allure.).Can also hear whisper to the ControlledPlayer.When the Controlled player is imprisoned,Dominator Can’t use his ability that night(Can also have ONLY 1 Controlled player.)

Edit 1.1 - Buffed Force Sucide.

Read full topic
